title: The best rework riot have ever done
body:
I know its been a while but I want to address and appreciate how well they did with Nunu and Willump. Because they did f**king amazing!

They turned a champion that was a boy on top of 4 polygons https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/72/Nunu_Render_old.png/revision/latest?cb=20180813161442

To a champion that is much more adorable, loveable and cudlly that everyone wants to play and doesn't get bored
https://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/newpix/2018/08/14/16/4F151F4400000578-0-image-a-13_1534262037391.jpg

With riot it sometimes takes a while or a few balances to get a champion just right (Looking at you {{champion:266}} {{champion:84}} ) but with Nunu and Willump they didnt really need any balancing.
You may argue that {{champion:19}} is the best rework but he had to go through quite a bit of balance changes from release

All in all I love Nunu and Willump and I think they are the best reworked champion.
